mapper.select: SELECT user_id AS userId , user_pw AS userPw , user_name AS userName , user_email AS userEmail , user_level AS userLevel FROM user_info

SELECT sc.course_name as courseName , ui.user_name as teacherName , cp.class_start_date as classStartDate , cp.class_end_date as classEndDate , cp.class_progress_day as classProgressDay , cp.class_start_time as classStartTime , cp.class_end_time as classEndTime FROM class_progress AS cp left join start_class AS sc on cp.start_class_code = sc.start_class_code LEFT join user_info AS ui ON cp.teacher_id = ui.user_id WHERE student_id = #{userId};
